jdbcService.sql: select distinct a.name, n.name as context from ~actions a left outer join ~nodes n on n.id = a.owner_id and n.component_id = (select id from ~components where name='context') join ~action_roles ar on a.id = ar.action_id -- guest roles in any context are allowed join ~roles r on ar.role_id = r.id and r.name = '$' || 'guest'
